document_title: Stage 2 breast cancer: Symptoms, treatment and prognosis
subsection_name: ung-thu-vu-giai-doan-2.json_0_What is stage II breast cancer?
subsection_content: Stage II breast cancer is a group of cancers that develop in the breast or in ipsilateral axillary lymph nodes, or both. Stage I breast cancer to stage IIA breast cancer can be classified as “early stages” of the disease; Stage IIB to stage III breast cancer can be classified as “locally advanced breast cancer”.
subsection_title: ung thu vu giai doan 2.json. What is stage II breast cancer?
subsection_data:
ung thu vu giai doan 2.json. What is stage II breast cancer?
Stage II breast cancer is a group of cancers that develop in the breast or in ipsilateral axillary lymph nodes, or both. Stage I breast cancer to stage IIA breast cancer can be classified as “early stages” of the disease; Stage IIB to stage III breast cancer can be classified as “locally advanced breast cancer”.
